title: NoSQL Selection with Darwin and Metcalf
abstract: NoSQL software selection is dominated by two forces – diversity of data types and a lack of standards. This presentation will focus on finding a balance of these two forces as seen through the lens of two great thinkers. Darwin was the observer of how different environments caused adaptation and specialization. Metcalf’s Law shows the value of networks based on standards grow exponentially with size. By integrating these perspectives, we will create a framework selecting the best NoSQL solution for your business problems.
